item.title: My1stbasic updated
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Much better.

Don’t forget to add semicolons at the end of each line.

You shouldn’t have only two procedures in the main loop. That’s where people look at, and they should be able to clearly understand what your script does just from that loop.

EDIT: This is what my scripting template looks like -

program legit_;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
  x, y :integer;
  
const
  g_ScarDisguise = 'All your bulldozing needs - John Queer - Mozilla Firefox'; //--> Set what you want to disguise the title of SCAR to.
  g_LampSkill = '';      //--> What do you want to gain exp in in case of a lamp?

procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
  HowManyPlayers := 1;        //--> If you add another player, you need to increase this number
  NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
  CurrentPlayer := 0;

  Players[0].Name := '....'; //--> Username Here
  Players[0].Pass := '....'; //--> Enter your password
  Players[0].Nick := '....'; //--> Three consecutive letters from the middle of your name (no caps)
  Players[0].Active := true; //--> Are you macroing with this player?
  Players[0].Booleans[0] := true; //--> Custom auto-respond?
end;

procedure StatusMessage(currstatus:string);
begin
  Status(currstatus);
  WriteLn(currstatus);
end;

procedure SetupScript;
begin
  ClearDebug;  //--* Clears the screen below
  StatusMessage('Setting up script.  Please be patient...'); //--* Sets the status message
  Disguise(g_ScarDisguise); //--* Disguises Scar to whatever title specified
  SetupSRL; //--* Self-explanatory
  DeclarePlayers; //--* Self-explanatory
  LampSkill := g_LampSkill; //--* Set lamp skill to specified lamp skill
  if (FindWindowBySize(766, 504)) then ActivateClient else    //--* Tries to find the RS Window
  begin
    StatusMessage('Error:  Cannot find a Runescape window.');
    TerminateScript;
  end;
end;

procedure SetupLogin;
begin
  StatusMessage('Logging in and setting up player...');
  LoginPlayer; //--* Contrary to popular belief, this checks to see if you are logged in.  To keep the code simple, there is no need to do another 'if (not (LoggedIn)).'
end;

procedure CustomAutoRespond;
begin
  if (FindChatText('acro')) then
  begin
    case Random(10) of
      0: TypeSend('lol macros');
      1: TypeSend('get those macros out of here');
      2: TypeSend('hate those freakin bots');
      3: TypeSend('i hate cheaters');
      4: TypeSend('why cant they just be legit');
      5: TypeSend('love alching');
      6: TypeSend('shut up');
      7: TypeSend('whatever man');
      8: TypeSend(':P');
      9: TypeSend(':)');
    end;
  end
  else
  begin
    case Random(10) of
      0: TypeSend('haha');
      1: TypeSend('lol...');
      2: TypeSend('this gets really boring.');
      3: TypeSend('i need some sleep');
      4: TypeSend('tired');
      5: TypeSend('sorta hungry');
      6: TypeSend('need to use the bathroom');
      7: TypeSend('brb');
      8: TypeSend('might need to leave soon');
      9: TypeSend('ive been doing this for hours');
    end;
  end;
end;

procedure AntiWait(milliseconds :Integer); //--> Only accurate to +150 ms;
var
  TimeMark1, TimeMark2 :integer;
begin
  TimeMark1 := GetSystemTime;
  Wait(100 + Random(100));
  FindTalk;
  case Random(30) of
    0: RandomMovement;
    1: FindNormalRandoms;
    2: FindDead;
    3: FindMod;
    4: FindFight;
    5: InConvo;
    6: AlmostLogout;
    7: PickUpMouse;
    8: RandomRClick;
    9: if (Players[CurrentPlayer].Booleans[0]) then CustomAutoRespond;
  end;
  Wait(100 + Random(100));
  while (GetSystemTime - TimeMark1 <= milliseconds) do
  begin
    Wait(100 + Random(50));
    FindTalk;
  end;
end;

begin
  SetupScript;
  while (true) do
  begin
    SetupLogin;
    while (true) do
    begin
    
    end;
    NextPlayer(true);
  end;
end.

item.title: My1stbasic updated
item.dc:creator: @scaper123 scaper123
item.description:
@scaper123 wrote:

new anti randoms added hoping to add anti ban soon enjoy[code] _my1stbasicscript_BY
~~~ Scaper123 ~~~
+~+~+~+~+~+~+~1.0+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+
+_________+~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~+_________+
~ Scaper_2007@msn.com ~

                          +~+ SCAR 3.12~DIVI,SRL4 +~+

======================================================================================================

 How to use: setup right below, that explains most of it please rember its my 1st script ever,
 note that this Basicautocuter won't work most area surronded by lots of trees i prefer to chop willows that are bulked together
          +~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~drops every 27 ore normaly! [WATCH  TO  LOADS]!!+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+
 You can have Axe equipped/unequiped as it auto clicks jus have the right wcin lvl for the axe,don't wear any valuable items!!
 follow guied lines click play and enjoy remember to post progs bugs and anything else related
 I TAKE NO RESPONSIBILTY IF U GET BANNED USE AT YOUR OWN RISK NO ANTI/BAN/RANDOM AT PRESENT.
 IF U WANT TO FLAME ME ON ANYTHING PLZ REMBER THIS IS MY 1ST SCRIPT AND OPEN TO SUGGESTIONS ALL WILL BE CREDITED WHEN IM COMFORTABLE ABOUT IT
I STRONGLY ADVISE TO AUTO PROBLY I MEEN WITH: CHAR CB LVL ABOVE 10 NOT DEFAULT CLOTHES:}


Program myfirsteverscript;

Const
 startupwait = 9000;//how long before script starts after compiling
 treecolor1 = 5933691;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P
 treecolor2 = 2192739;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P
 treecolor3 = 3768947;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P =colorpicker for those of u who dont no.
 choppinginterval = 9000;// time before chopping each log
 drop = true; // do you wanna drop? if false set logs to chop to 28

 logstochop = 27;//how many Logs to cut,//Watch the first 1or2 loads before changing this//

 {.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Function FindFastRandoms: Boolean;// credits to Wt-Fakawi
var
  i: Integer;
begin
  for i:=0 to 9 do
  begin
    case I of
     0:  If FindTalk then
     begin
       FindNormalRandoms;
     end;
     1:  If FindDead then
           Result := True;
     2:  If FindMod then
           Result := True;
     3:  If FindMime then
           Result := True;
     4:  If FindMaze then
           Result := True;
     5:  If FindQuiz then
           Result := True;
     6:  If FindDemon then
           Result := True;
     7: begin
        if NoGameTab then
        begin
          Result := True;

          Logout;
          Exit;
        end;
        end;
     8: begin
           if InBlack then
           begin
             Result := True;
             Logout;
             Exit;
           end;
         end;
       9: RC;
    end;
    FindFight;
    FindFightEx;
  end;
end;

Procedure NoRandoms;
begin
  FindTalk;
  FindNormalRandoms;
  FindFastRandoms;
  SolvePinball;
  if (FindFight = true) then
  begin
    RunAwayDirection('n');
    wait(10000+Random(5000));
    RunBack;
  end;
end;

Procedure _1stbasicautocutter_;

 var
 i, x, y: integer;
 Begin
cleardebug;
 writeln('1st basic autocutter will begin soon,post comments bugs and ')
 writeln('All comments on the site were u got this')
 writeln('_1st basic autocutter_ has no futer updates as yet. Procced to site for futer updates')
 writeln('thanx for tresting and posting proggies')

 wait(startupwait)
Repeat
NoRandoms;
 i:= i + 1
 if (drop = true) then
Dropall;
Cleardebug;
 //======================================================== //
 writeln('~+~You sucessfully chopped~+~= ' + inttostr(i))
 writeln('~+~You sucessfully dropped~+~= ' + inttostr(i))
 writeln('Hopefully this script has been working for  ' + timerunning)
 //==========================================================//


 If (FindColor(x, y, treecolor1, 0, 0, 517, 337)) or
 (FindColor(x, y, treecolor2, 0, 0, 517, 337)) and
 (FindColor(x, y, treecolor3, 0, 0, 517, 337))then
    mmouse(x,y,2,2)
    mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
  wait(choppinginterval+random(15000))
Until i = logstochop


 Writeln('script has worked for ' + timerunning)
 Writeln('logs chopped ' + inttostr(i))
 Writeln('logs dropped ' +inttostr(i))
End;

Begin
setupsrl
_1stbasicautocutter_
End.[/code]
